name: Othello (King Size)
overview: A version of the Othello board game by Exodus-Soft and released by King Soft (Robtek) and later in International Arcade Action and the Amiga Stars Collection compilations. It was coded in AmigaBASIC and released in UK and Australia and while known as Championship Othello, it only said Othello on the Robtek retail box. The OziSoft Amiga Stars Collection had the Championship Othello name. Othello is an exciting board game played against the computer or another person on a 8 x 8 grid. The idea is to try and place your piece so that it outflanks your opponent creating a horizontal, vertical or diagonal run of opposing pieces, making them yours. Player with the most pieces 'WINS'.
